attributes.action: Remove tax on 'green' fuel such as biodiesel and autogas?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the government claims that increased taxes on fuel and unavoidable car use is a 'green' tax not intended to raise revenue it can prove this by removing all tax on auto gas,biodiesel and the use of vegetable oil as fuel.

It could go further to prove 'green' credentials by using the tax on petrol and diesel to subsidise 'green' alternatives.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Remove tax on 'green' fuel such as biodiesel and autogas?."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11393.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Greenfueltax/
